2: <mistake>de</mistake> ru ka ni <mistake>bskyed</mistake> pa'i rgyu//dang por gcig ni <mistake>bsgam</mistake> par bya//rdo rje snying po snying rje che//dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing//dngos po'i <mistake>'chong</mistake> bas 'ching bar <mistake>'gyur //yongs</mistake> <mistake>su shes</mistake> pas grol
3: ba yin//dngos po med par yongs shes pas//dngos po <mistake>bsgom</mistake> 'gyur shes rab can//dngos po med pa yongs shes <mistake>pa//de</mistake> ltar he ru ka bsgom bya//lus la ye shes chen po <mistake>gnas//tog</mistake>
4: pa thams cad yang dag <mistake>spangs//dngos</mistake> <mistake>zo</mistake> kun la khyab pa po//lus gnas lus <mistake>la</mistake> ma skyes <mistake>pa'o//rdo</mistake> rje snying pos gsol <mistake>pa//gkye</mistake> bcom ldan <mistake>'das rdo</mistake> rje'i lus la rtsa du lags//bcom ldan
5: 'das kyis bka' <mistake>stul</mistake> <mistake>pa//rtsa</mistake> rnams <mistake>ni sumcu</mistake> <mistake>rtsa</mistake> gnyis <mistake>te//byang</mistake> chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>bdi</mistake> ba chen <mistake>pho'i</mistake> gnas su 'dzag pa'o//de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa <mistake>rnams</mistake>
6: pa gsum ni gtso <mistake>mo</mistake> <mistake>ste//rgyang</mistake> ma <mistake>dang ro</mistake> ma <mistake>dang / kun</mistake> 'dar ma'o//rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis//thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas//kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su//gzung dang 'dzin pa
7: rnam par spangs//rkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste//ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing//shes <mistake>ral</mistake> zla ba 'bab <mistake>bshang</mistake> pa//de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags//mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma dang rtse ba
8: ma <mistake>dang//g.yon</mistake> pa ma dang thung du ma <mistake>dang /ru</mistake> <mistake>spal</mistake> skyes ma dang sgom pa ma <mistake>dang/dbang</mistake> ma dang skyon ma dang 'jug ma dang ma mo <mistake>dang / bsil</mistake> sbyin ma dang <mistake>tshb</mistake> <mistake>mdang/ brkyang</mistake> <mistake>madang</mistake> kun <mistake>'ngar</mistake> ma dang <mistake>ros</mistake>
